$eref.description: Create properties for a linked server

___linkedRedisCacheId.description: Fully qualified resourceId of the linked redis cache.

$eref.description: Properties supplied to Create Redis operation.

___enableNonSslPort.description: Specifies whether the non-ssl Redis server port (6379) is enabled.

___shardCount.description: The number of shards to be created on a Premium Cluster Cache.

___sku.description: The SKU of the Redis cache to deploy.

___subnetId.description: The full resource ID of a subnet in a virtual network to deploy the Redis cache in. Example format: /subscriptions/{subid}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/Microsoft.{Network|ClassicNetwork}/VirtualNetworks/vnet1/subnets/subnet1

___staticIP.description: Static IP address. Required when deploying a Redis cache inside an existing Azure Virtual Network.

___redisConfiguration.description: All Redis Settings. Few possible keys: rdb-backup-enabled,rdb-storage-connection-string,rdb-backup-frequency,maxmemory-delta,maxmemory-policy,notify-keyspace-events,maxmemory-samples,slowlog-log-slower-than,slowlog-max-len,list-max-ziplist-entries,list-max-ziplist-value,hash-max-ziplist-entries,hash-max-ziplist-value,set-max-intset-entries,zset-max-ziplist-entries,zset-max-ziplist-value etc.

___properties.description: Properties required to create a linked server.
List of patch schedules for a Redis cache.
Properties required to create a firewall rule .

___zones.description: A list of availability zones denoting where the resource needs to come from.

$eref.description: Specifies a range of IP addresses permitted to connect to the cache

___startIP.description: lowest IP address included in the range

___endIP.description: highest IP address included in the range

___properties.description: Properties required to create a firewall rule .

_88RedisCreateProperties.description: Properties supplied to Create Redis operation.

___enableNonSslPort.description: Specifies whether the non-ssl Redis server port (6379) is enabled.

___shardCount.description: The number of shards to be created on a Premium Cluster Cache.

$eref.description: SKU parameters supplied to the create Redis operation.

___name.description: The type of Redis cache to deploy. Valid values: (Basic, Standard, Premium).

___capacity.description: The size of the Redis cache to deploy. Valid values: for C (Basic/Standard) family (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6), for P (Premium) family (1, 2, 3, 4).

___family.description: The SKU family to use. Valid values: (C, P). (C = Basic/Standard, P = Premium).

___sku.description: The SKU of the Redis cache to deploy.

___subnetId.description: The full resource ID of a subnet in a virtual network to deploy the Redis cache in. Example format: /subscriptions/{subid}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/Microsoft.{Network|ClassicNetwork}/VirtualNetworks/vnet1/subnets/subnet1

___staticIP.description: Static IP address. Required when deploying a Redis cache inside an existing Azure Virtual Network.

___redisConfiguration.description: All Redis Settings. Few possible keys: rdb-backup-enabled,rdb-storage-connection-string,rdb-backup-frequency,maxmemory-delta,maxmemory-policy,notify-keyspace-events,maxmemory-samples,slowlog-log-slower-than,slowlog-max-len,list-max-ziplist-entries,list-max-ziplist-value,hash-max-ziplist-entries,hash-max-ziplist-value,set-max-intset-entries,zset-max-ziplist-entries,zset-max-ziplist-value etc.
